alt: my first allotment plot at the start of working it
title: Why Have An Allotment?
description: An article looking at the challenges of working an allotment and the benefits of having one.

alt: new allotment plot being marked out
title: How To Start An Allotment
description: A step by step guide on how to start an allotment, containing practical tips for a first time plot holder.

alt: hand drawing of an allotment layout
title: Planning An Allotment Layout
description: An introduction to planning an allotment layout, covering what to include, planting design, the principles of crop rotation, and practical tips.

alt: A new no-dig bed on an allotment
title: How To Make No Dig Beds
description: A video guide on how to make no-dig beds for an allotment, including the advantages of no-dig beds, how they reduce work, and the growing cycle.

alt: A new polytunnel on an allotment
title: Allotment Polytunnels
description: Looking at how an allotment polytunnel can extend the growing season from late winter to late autumn, and make growing heat sensitive plants much easier.

alt: A shed standing on an allotment
title: Allotment Sheds
description: An introduction to the types of allotment sheds available, options for making a shed base, and things to consider when choosing an allotment shed.
